body_html: 1080 is still pretty decent, with ~.32 s runtimes for batch 32. And 1080Ti is better still:-) What you are seeing is strange, may be you should rm -rf build? setup.py sometimes gets confused by old builds. To repro my numbers, try building docker image with tools/docker/Dockerfile_v6 - that will be a fresh install with no cudnn v5 hanging around, and then try figuring out what's wrong with your installs.
